tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_age INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  trial_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  trial_id INT
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE trials (
  trial_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trial_name VARCHAR(50),
  trial_phase VARCHAR(20),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  sponsor VARCHAR(50)
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE Patients (
   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_name VARCHAR(255),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TrialParticipants (
   participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id INT,
   trial_id INT,
   enrollment_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (trial_id) REFERENCES Trials(trial_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TrialSite (
  site_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name TEXT,
  address TEXT,
  city TEXT,
  country TEXT
);
